Connecting to Serena ChangeMan Mover

Use the Deployment Setup dialog box (Admin | Mover Setup) to enable users to access the Mover Login page from Version Manager.

NOTE
  • The Mover URL is stored for each project database.

  • You must have Administrator privileges to specify the Mover URL in Version Manager.
To define the Mover URL:

  1. In Version Manager, open the project database for which you want to define the ChangeMan URL. You must log in to this project database as a user who has Administrator privileges.

  2. Select Admin | Mover Setup. The Deployment Setup dialog box appears.

  3. Enter the Mover URL in the Server URL field:

    http://server:port/servlet

    For example, if Mover is installed to port 80 (the default) on a server called Deployment, enter http://Deployment:80/servlet

  4. Click OK. If Version Manager is unable to establish a connection to the Mover server, an error appears. Otherwise, you are returned to the desktop client and can now log in to Mover.
To access the Mover Login page:
  • From the Version Manager desktop client, select Admin | Mover.

  • From the Version Manager web client, select Actions | Mover.
